null_scoring: Treat null as 0 for scoring contributions; do not eliminate on nullâ€”flag for verification instead.

hard_filters.description: Enforce minimum hospital cover from Q_HOSPITAL_LEVEL. If hospital_cover is null, keep but flag 'verify'.
If maternity required, eliminate only if maternity_cover == false; keep if null and flag.
If mental health required, eliminate only if mental_health == false; keep if null and flag.
If overseas required, eliminate only if overseas_emergency == false; keep if null and flag.

explainability.verification_flag_text: Some benefits are not yet populated for this plan (public source verification needed).

tie_breakers: If scores within 5 points, prefer higher completeness_score
If still tied, prefer fewer verification flags (fewer NULLs on mapped must-have fields)
